DOC.brief_summary: The investigator intend find contrast agent less kidney toxicity renal impaired patient undergoing cardiac angiography percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Comparison Iopromide Iodixanol Renal Impaired Patients
DOC.detailed_description: In diagnosis treatment coronary heart disease , patient undergo cardiac angiography percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) . In procedure , investigator use contrast medium , may cause kidney toxicity especially patient chronic renal insufficiency .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old old Plan undergo Cardiac Catheterization Signed ICF eGFR : 30~59 mL/min/1.73m2 Pregnancy Under dialysis Conditions interfere Cardiac Catheterization Participation trial Allergic Xray contrast medium Administration investigational drug within previous 30 day Intraarterial intravenous administration iodinate contrast medium 7 day 72 hour administration study drug Left ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) less 30 % ultrasound examination Intake nephrotoxic medication 24 hour administration study drug
